description: Nono is the main heroine of http://anidb.net/a5275 [Yotsunoha]. Despite being one year younger than Makoto, she is really helpful, taking tasks such as cooking and homemaking for http://anidb.net/ch16566 [Makoto] and http://anidb.net/ch16567 [Iori], who lived next door to her prior to their separation. She has moved to Kansai region after the school`s closure.
name: Nekomiya Nono
